title: Every Man His Own Cigar Lighter

sources.title: Every Man His Own Cigar Lighter
sources.description: The original French title for the print fragment is Un peu de feu s.v.p. IMDb Page

metadata.Plot: According to the original Star Film Catalogue description, this mostly-lost short film was about an English millionaire who, while vacationing in France, wishes to light a smoke while sightseeing. However, as all he can find is a single match which won't light, he asks several other passers-by to oblige him, but is turned down. Suddenly, he has a brilliant plan: he'll create a gentleman who will oblige. With this, he magically divides himself into two different millionaires, both of them completely identical. One of these two personages asks the other of a match; he happily obliges, and the two men then merge back into one person.
